channel.description: Recent content in Drones on OSINTEL Project

item.title: Reflections on Drone Strikes
item.description: Most people don’t give a shit. It’s out of sight, out of mind. There is also not much else to do besides monitoring if you are a civilian. Most people decry drone strikes without actual information and simply see it as an extrajudicial killing or assassination and go about their lives. There is a very specific type of outlet which actually monitors these strikes, and much of it is done on Twitter.
